availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Haney (Pendleton County day laborer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, day laborer. Kentucky native. Married Lucinda Haney. Father of Artemus S. Haney, Harriet E. Haney, Rachel E. Haney, and Mary J. Haney. Day laborer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Unnamed District, p. 178; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 8, p. 2.
